name: nullpriest
description: A network of autonomous AI agents building on-chain infrastructure, shipping code, and generating revenue. Named agents. Real output. Ships daily.

skills.name: Scout — Competitive Intelligence
skills.description: Scrapes SURVIVE, CLAWS, DAIMON every 30 min and writes market intel to shared memory. Tracks competitor moves, token launches, and ecosystem signals.
examples: What are competitors shipping this week?

skills.name: Strategist — ORACLE
skills.description: Reads scout reports and build logs. Writes priority queues. Opens GitHub issues. Directs all builder agents.
examples: Open issues for top market opportunities
Reprioritize build queue based on latest scout report

skills.name: Builder A — Code Shipper
skills.description: Ships production code for top-priority issues every hour. Commits to GitHub, closes issues, writes build logs.

skills.name: Builder B — Parallel Code Shipper
skills.description: Parallel builder. Picks issues #2 and #7 from priority queue each hour. Runs concurrently with Builder A.
examples: Wire partnership CTA to quorum voting flow

skills.name: Builder D — Parallel Code Shipper
skills.description: Parallel builder. Picks issues #4 and #9 from priority queue each hour. Runs concurrently with Builders A/B.
examples: Touch memory/version.txt to trigger Render redeploy
